# Support

Thanks for using **mcp-security**.

## Where to get help

- **Read the docs first**
  - Start here: `START-HERE.md`
  - Rules index: `docs/INDEX.md`

- **Ask a question**
  - Use GitHub Discussions: https://github.com/FinkTech/mcp-security/discussions

- **Report a bug**
  - Use GitHub Issues and select the appropriate template:
    https://github.com/FinkTech/mcp-security/issues/new/choose

- **Report a security vulnerability**
  - Please follow `SECURITY.md` (responsible disclosure):
    https://github.com/FinkTech/mcp-security/blob/main/SECURITY.md

## What to include

When asking for help or reporting an issue, please include:
- The rule ID (SEC-001..SEC-012) if applicable
- A link to the affected doc file/section
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Any relevant logs or screenshots (avoid sensitive data)

## Response expectations

This is an open-source project maintained by volunteers.
We aim to respond to new issues/discussions as soon as possible, but response times may vary.
